Package simulation

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ActiveLog
    This class show the current status of the system in a JTextArea.
    BreakInSimulation
    This class generates the break in animation.
    BreakInSimulationThread
    This is a thread class.
    ControlPanel
    Control panel is the upper part of the device window.
    DeviceWindow
    Device window has a Tabbed panel to save schedule, view schedule and search.
    Email
    Email class, to send email to user.
    FireSimulation
    Shows fire animation when fire simulation is selected.
    FireSimulationThread
    This thread starts when fire starts It check the system and start necessary actions
    HintTextField
    This class is used for showing the date format hint in date TextField
    LoginCard
    Manage log in action in the device window.
    LoginWindow
    This is a CardLayout that contains login and device window.
    Messages
    Constant messages
    PlaySound
    Gets a audio file and generates a audio system to play sounds.
    ScheduleAndConfiguration
    This class get all configuration and schedule data from database.
    SearchSchedule
    Search a date in the database, if temperature or motion sensor is set for the date it shows the information to the user.
    ShowHouseMap
    This class show the house map for simulation.
    ShowLogThread
    This thread shows live log on activelog panel at the bottom of the device window.
    Simulation
    Simulation window
    SimulationControl
    This class controls the simulation.It has two parts.
    StyledButtonUI  
    ViewSchedulePanel
    Show upcoming schedule to user in JTable
